quotes.message: Big words seldom accompany good deeds.
quotes.name: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.message: Good deeds are seldom remembered; bad deeds are seldom forgotten.
quotes.name: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.message: The good deed you do today, for a brother or sister in need will come back to you some day, for humanity's a circle in deed.
quotes.name: Robert Alan Aurthur

quotes.message: Good deeds from good intentions flow; but good intentions only; build for us a place below.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back.
quotes.name: Charles De Lint

quotes.message: When you are kind to others, it not only changes you, it changes the world.
quotes.name: Harold Kushner

quotes.message: Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
quotes.name: Douglas Horton

quotes.message: A good deed hidden in silence dies.
quotes.name: Pindar

quotes.message: Seek to do good, and you will find that happiness will run after you.
quotes.name: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.message: There is a sort of gratification in doing good which makes us rejoice in ourselves.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: If you do one good deed, your reward is to be set to do another and harder and better one.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: A good deed is like peeing in your pants. Everyone knows you did it, but only you can feel it's warmth.
quotes.name: Zoroaster

quotes.message: The smallest good deed is better than the grandest intention.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: Men do not value a good deed unless it brings a reward.
quotes.name: Ovid Poet

quotes.message: Good deeds are no less good because their object is unworthy.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: According to the Sutras, evil deeds result in hardships and good deeds result in blessings.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Good deeds should be done with intention, not for attention.
quotes.name: Sayed Hadi al-Qazwini

quotes.message: It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quotes.name: Peter Marshall

quotes.message: To be doing good deeds is man's most glorious task.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The nicest feeling in the world is to do a good deed anonymously-and have somebody find out.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: If we have the opportunity to be generous with our hearts, we have no idea of the depth and breadth of love's reach.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A good deed is never lost. He who sows courtesy, reaps friendship; he who plants kindness, gathers love; pleasure bestowed on a grateful mind was never sterile, but generally gratitude begets reward.
quotes.name: Saint Basil

quotes.message: It is part of a good man to do great and noble deeds, though he risk everything.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Good deeds are seeds of generosity.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Good actions ennoble us, and we are the sons of our deeds.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: Anyone who proposes to do good must not expect people to roll stones out of his way, but must accept his lot calmly, even if they roll a few stones upon it.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: You dont see its growth. But, it does by days. Doing the wicked deeds is like the hone. You dont see its damage. But, it does by days.
quotes.name: Gautama Buddha

quotes.message: Even though your time on the job is temporary, if you do a good enough job, your work there will last forever.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: The best deed of a great man is to forgive and forget.
quotes.name: Ali Ibn Abi Talib A.S

quotes.message: Know you not that a good man does nothing for appearance sake, but for the sake of having done right?
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Our worth is determined by the good deed we do, rather than by the fine emotions we feel.
quotes.name: Edgar Magnin

quotes.message: Better do a good deed near at home than go far away to burn incense.
quotes.name: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: Talking isn't doing. It is a kind of good deed to say well; and yet words are not deeds.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Wherever there is a human in need, there is an opportunity for kindness and to make a difference.
quotes.name: Kevin Heath

quotes.message: That best portion of a good manâ€™s life; His little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: This is what my soul is telling me: Be peaceful and love everyone.
quotes.name: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.message: Better a good deed that is boasted than no good deed at all.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Good deeds are the best prayer.
quotes.name: Serbian Proverb

quotes.message: Good deeds may not be rewarded; even good firewood may ruin the stove.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: The smallest good deed is better than the grandest good intention.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Good deeds return to the house of their author.
quotes.name: Persian Proverb

quotes.message: Do good to thy friend to keep him, to thy enemy to gain him.
quotes.name: Poor Richard

quotes.message: Deeds are love and not fine phrases.
quotes.name: Old Proverb

quotes.message: Each small task of everyday life is part of the total harmony of the universe.
quotes.name: St. Theresa of Lisieux

quotes.message: A life spent worthily should be measured by deeds, not years.
quotes.name: Richard Sheridan

quotes.message: Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: A man makes no noise over a good deed, but passes on to another as a vine to bear grapes again in season.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: It is not enough to do good; one must do it in a good way.
quotes.name: Marquis de Condorcet

quotes.message: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: You can fake being cool, but you can't fake being good.
quotes.name: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.message: A good edge is good for nothing, if it has nothing to cut.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: The profit of a good action is to have done it.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: To be good is noble, but to teach others how to be good is nobler - and less trouble.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is an idea abroad among moral people that they should make their neighbours good. One person I have to make good: myself.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Good words make us laugh; good deeds make us silent.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: One good deed is better than three days of fasting at a shrine.
quotes.name: Japanese saying
